Posts.Content: Thanks Dom - that really helps.  I have my first meeting with the oncologist next week, fingers crossed for something better than what's in my mind!  It's grade 2, ER pos (not sure about HER2 at the moment) - I understand this means that I can have targeted hormone treatment.  I wish you and your wife all the best.
Posts.Title: Grade 2 ER pos ductal

Posts.Content: Thank you Beachwalker19 for your kind words - this is one of the scariest times of my life so far, as I am sure that all of you on here are aware, having been through it (or going through it) at some point.  Meeting with the oncologist for the first time next week - fingers crossed for a less than scary outcome...
Posts.Title: Grade 2 ER pos ductal

Posts.Content: Hi everyone - first timer and still in shock.  Had my diagnosis last week and waiting to have a scan next week.  Am terrified that it has spread and can't stop worrying.
Posts.Title: Grade 2 ER pos ductal
